WorkItem.ClosedComment:
As part of our move to GitHub, we're closing our CodePlex suggestions and asking that people move them to the GitHub issue tracker for further discussion.  Some feature requests may already be active on GitHub, so please make sure to look for an existing issue before filing a new one.

You can find our GitHub issue tracker here:
https://github.com/microsoft/typeScript/issues
WorkItem.Description:
Basically I would like to have better type inference for indexers. I already described issue here:
https://typescript.codeplex.com/workitem/2391
but since this would be a breaking change.
I suggest that this behaviour should be opt-in. Something like "inferIndexer" switch that could be easily passed when compiling. This option would probably be most used with "noImplicitAny" because then we don't have any breaking change to existing code and stil have better type inference and type safety.
WorkItem.Summary: add option for better type inference for indexers

Comments.Message: Something we can look into for a future version.
